datasets.title: Sea Animals Image Dataset
datasets.description: This dataset contains 23 different classes of sea animals with irrelevant images removed.

datasets.title: Marine Animal Images Dataset
datasets.description: A collection of high-quality images of various marine animals.

datasets.title: Zoo Dataset
datasets.description: A simple database with 17 Boolean-valued attributes, likely related to animal classification.

datasets.title: Animal Image Classification Dataset
datasets.description: A comprehensive collection of images for developing and evaluating machine learning models for animal image classification.

datasets.title: Smartbay Marine Species Object Detection Training dataset
datasets.description: An initial Bounding Box Annotated image dataset for training object detection models to classify marine fauna.

datasets.title: Aquatic animals Dataset
datasets.description: Contains 400 images of 8 different types of aquatic animals (crab, octopus, seahorse, seal, seaturtle, shark, and starfish).
